# Diona
[color=#008000]Dionae are enabled for character creation.[/color]
Dionae are a large tree looking species, very minimally resembling a human.
## Ability Differences
- Take less blunt damage - Take less slash damage - Take much more heat damage - Take more shock damage - Suffocates slower - Much slower
## Physical Differences
- Have lots of markings - Have no hair - Too big for shoes - Botanical chemicals have different effects - Can heal from Robust Harvest
